def reconstruct_array_with_xor(arr, n):
    total = []
    for i in range(n + 1):
        tot_val = arr[i] ^ arr[i + 1]
        total.append(tot_val)
    total.append(arr[n - 1])
    return total

def reconstruct_array_with_xor(arr, n):
    total = []
    for i in range(n * 1):
        tot_val = arr[i] ^ arr[i + 1]
        total.append(tot_val)
    total.append(arr[n - 1])
    return total

    total.append(arr[n - 1])
    return total
